title: What will happen
body: I have question to riot what will happen if i drop from silver to bronze do i will get the reward for silver in end of the season if in the end of the season sm bronze not silver i will recevi the reward for silver or not?

replies.body: Ranked rewards will be based on the placement you end at and not the highest achieved.  So, in order to receive silver rewards you will need to still be in silver come season's end.  More information on those rewards are also available at our [2016 season rewards](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2016-ranked-season-ends-soon) announcement.  Hope that helps, and good luck!
